snippet.title: Rainbow Dreams - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Luka Sanguis, a college student unwittingly married to a Goddess, as he uncovers the mysteries of the world around him in this slice of life/comedy visual novel. Living a double life, Luka tangles with both his personal troubles as well as his role in saving the world from Daemons. Coming soon! 18+ and all ages versions will be available. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/590800/Rainbow_Dreams/
Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/tophatstudiosen
